au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=L2=20m_lens_medium1_apx5
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 8.1) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength', 8.1) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(19250,0) # Drive guide to lens config driveGuide(guideConfig.lens) # Drive entrance aperture to 30 (for lens) driveEntRotAp(30) #set sample ap to 5 mm sics.drive('apx', -23) # Drive beamstops up selBs(5) sics.set('beamcenterx', 95.77) sics.set('beamcenterz', 92.40)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(49, 100) # Drive attenuator to 120 driveAtt(120)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(49, 0) driveBsz(242.5)
